ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-icn | |- _i e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_efexp | |- ( ( ( _i x. A ) e. CC /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ^ N ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ^ N ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mul12 | |- ( ( N e. CC /\ _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) = ( _i x. ( N x. A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( N e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) = ( _i x. ( N x. A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( N e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. ( N x. A ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( N e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( N x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 11 |  | #P_efival | |- ( ( N x. A ) e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. ( N x. A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( _i x. ( N x. A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( N e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ N e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( _i x. A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_efival | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ^ N ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ^ N ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ^ N ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ^ N ) ) |
| 19 | 5, 15, 18 | #P_3eqtr3rd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ^ N ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) |
